about_the_game:
Ten crime scenes. 

Six suspects. 

One question.

Whodunit? 

Solving the timeless murder mystery at the iconic Tudor Mansion is one thing, but only the sharpest detectives will be able to close these ten all-new cases set across the world. 

From the tropical heat of the Black Adder Resort to the deceptive peace of Whispering Pines Retreat, journey from crime scene to crime scene as familiar faces crop up again and again. 

The Epic Crime Collection gives you immediate access to all currently released crime scenes, along with future crime scenes as they launch. This means you’ll have a total of ten devious crime scenes to explore! Plus, you’ll also be able to play any of the special revisited crime scenes as they launch. 

INCLUDES:

  • THE BLACK ADDER RESORT – Mr Callan Coral, a former business partner of Mr Boden “Boddy” Black, has invited everyone suspected of his business associate’s murder to lie low on his tropical island. However, things take a turn for the worse when they once again find themselves at the heart of another murder mystery!

  • CASE FILES REVISITED – A hyacinth blooms in death once more, bringing shades of gray to the Black Adder Resort crime scene! Agent Gray and Analyst Hyacinth join the suspect roster, but are either of them the real culprit? Or has the true murderer dragged them in to muddy the waters? 

  • WHISPERING PINES RETREAT – The calm, quiet solitude of Whispering Pines Retreat makes it the ideal location for relaxation…and revenge. A new story unfolds as a group of six supposed strangers seek refuge in the brand-new forest wellness centre, but things take a dreadful turn when they become entangled in a shocking crime…

  • MORE CRIME SCENES TO COME – Investigate new murders in original crime scenes exclusive to the digital board game. Unravel fresh webs of deception, examine detailed character profiles, consider new evidence and catch the culprit!

Sharpen your sleuthing skills with the ultimate Clue/Cluedo experience!
